original_title: 地元へ帰省した三日間、人妻になっていた憧れの同級生と時を忘れて愛し合った記録―。 神宮寺ナオ
overview: This summer, when cicadas never stopped singing, I used my vacation to return to my hometown. I put my hands on the altar and exchanged light words with his father and headed to the park where I met up with his best friend Takashi. He was twilight looking at the lake when he was suddenly poked on the shoulder. Looking back, Nao, who had always been her favorite during her school days, was standing there. She is Takashi's wife now. And she is invited by the two to have dinner at their home. Without knowing that the hands of the clock that stopped when I was a student will begin to move.
title: I Went Back To My Hometown And Met Up With An Old Classmate I Had A Crush On. She's A Married Woman Now, But We Forgot About That And Shared Our True Feelings. Nao Jinguji
